Pleasanton.Village High School: Village High School (commonly called Village) is a public continuation high school located in Pleasanton, California, United States, a community in the San Francisco East Bay area. Village is a part of the Pleasanton Unified School District, which also includes Amador Valley High School, Foothill High School, and Horizon High School. The high school was formed for students from Amador Valley and Foothill with low grades, multiple absences, or credit deficiencies.
